title: Bleh
review: It was off to a great start but then I suffered through the last half. I wouldn't really recommend someone spend 2 hours watching this unless you're really bored and have nothing left to do. It's weird and kind of funny but there's just not much there.

title: Amazing
review: I love anything to do with outer space. This movie was entertaining, had good acting and accurate science. It was hard for me to name a movie which is my favorite because I love many movies BUT this one is clearly one of my all time favorites now. I've watched it multiple times and every time I'm glued to the television.

title: So great
review: I love this movie. It's cute and funny. My 6 and 4 year old enjoyed it as well!

title: Don't waste your time.
review: Very slow. Boring. Decent acting I suppose. What's the main point of this movie?? All in all its way too long and very dull.

title: Good movie
review: I really like this movie. I've watched it several times. The only thing I don't like is the wife's character. Typical pushover perfect mom hot wife role lol it's a bit annoying.
